rules.name: Gromril Shields
rules.text: This unit can create a shield wall instead of running or charging in its turn. If it does so, re-roll all failed save rolls for the unit in the combat phase until its next movement phase.

rules.name: I thought Dwarfs were made of sterner stuff!
rules.text: Roll a dice each time a Dispossessed model from your army flees whilst within 8" of this unit; on a 5 or more that model stands firm under the Longbeards’ stern gaze and does not flee.

rules.name: Who does this beardling think he is?
rules.text: Dispossessed Heroes from your army within 8" of this unit in the hero phase can use their command abilities even if they are not your general.

rules.name: Goblins are weedier these days!
rules.text: You can re-roll wound rolls of 1 for Dispossessed models from your army that are within 8" of this unit when they attack in the combat phase.

rules.name: Dwarf Shields
rules.text: A unit equipped with Dwarf Shields can create a shield wall instead of running or charging in its turn. If it does so, re-roll all failed save rolls for the unit in the combat phase until its next movement phase.

rules.name: Resolute In Defence
rules.text: You can re-roll failed wound rolls of 1 when attacking with a Dwarf Warrior in your opponent’s combat phase. You can instead re-roll all failed wound rolls for a Dwarf Warrior if its unit has 20 or more models when it attacks in your opponent’s combat phase.

rules.name: Runic Icon
rules.text: Roll a dice if a spell affects a unit with any Runic Icons. On a roll of a 5 or a 6, that spell has no affect on the unit (but it will affect other units normally).

rules.name: Clan Banner
rules.text: If you fail a battleshock test for a unit that has any Clan Banners, halve the number of models that flee (rounding up).

rules.name: Dwarf Bucklers
rules.text: If a unit is equipped with Dwarf Bucklers, it can create a shield wall instead of running or charging in its turn. If it does so, re-roll all failed save rolls for the unit in the combat phase until its next movement phase.

rules.name: Volley Fire
rules.text: Quarrellers can shoot twice if their unit has 20 or more models and there are no enemy models within 3".

rules.name: Runic Icon
rules.text: Roll a dice if a spell affects a unit with any Runic Icons. On a roll of a 5 or a 6, that spell has no affect on the unit (but it will affect other units normally).

rules.name: Clan Banner
rules.text: If you fail a battleshock test for a unit that has any Clan Banners, halve the number of models that flee (rounding up).

rules.name: Seeking a Glorious Death
rules.text: You do not need to take battleshock tests for a unit of Slayers if they can see an enemy Monster.

rules.name: Deathblow
rules.text: If a Slayer is slain in the combat phase, roll a dice before it is removed. On a roll of 4 or more, you can inflict 1 mortal wound on the enemy unit that struck the fatal blow after all of its attacks have been made.

rules.name: Slayer Oath
rules.text: You can add 1 to any wound rolls for a Slayer if the target of the attack has more than 1 Wound.

rules.name: The Slayer King
rules.text: Slayers make an extra attack with their Slayer Axes whilst their unit is within 8" of Ungrim Ironfist the Slayer King.

rules.name: Kingsguard
rules.text: You do not need to take battleshock tests for this unit if it is within 16" of a Dispossessed Hero from your army in the battleshock phase.

rules.name: Cinderblast Bomb
rules.text: Once per battle, a model with a Cinderblast Bomb can throw it in your shooting phase. To do so, pick a unit within 6" and roll a dice; on a 2 or more, that unit suffers D3 mortal wounds.

rules.name: Gromril Shields
rules.text: This unit can create a shield wall instead of running or charging in its turn. If it does so, re-roll all failed save rolls for the unit in the combat phase until its next movement phase.

rules.name: Forge-proven Gromril Armour
rules.text: When you make save rolls for this unit, ignore the enemy’s Rend characteristic unless it is -2 or better.

rules.name: Rune of Burning
rules.text: When an Engineer stamps this rune onto a Flame Cannon its next shot burns with the fury of a raging forge. A Flame Burst inflicts D6 mortal wounds on the target instead of D3 if there is a Duardin Engineer from your army within 1" of the war machine (it will also inflict an additional D6 mortal wounds instead of D3 if the unit is set ablaze, as described in Flame Burst).

rules.name: Rune of Forging
rules.text: These runes are used by Engineers to ensure that their war machine stays true and does not misfire in the heat of battle. You can re-roll the dice rolled to see if an Organ Gun jams if there is a Duardin Engineer from your army within 1" of the war machine.

rules.name: Explosive Shells
rules.text: You can re-roll the damage inflicted by a Cannon Shell if the target unit has 10 or more models.

rules.name: Rune of Accuracy
rules.text: Engineers can inscribe Cannon Shells with magical runes to guide them to their target. You can re-roll failed hit rolls when firing a Cannon Shell if there is a Duardin Engineer from your army within 1" of the war machine.

rules.name: Runes of Spellbreaking
rules.text: A Runelord can attempt to unbind one enemy spell in the enemy hero phase as if he were a wizard. You can add 2 to any unbinding rolls for a Runelord.

rules.name: Rune Lore
rules.text: In your hero phase a Runelord can pray to the Ancestor Gods to imbue his allies’ weapons and armour with power. If he does so, pick a Dispossessed unit within 16" (pick a unit within 24" instead if the Runelord is within 8" of Thorek Ironbrow), select a power and roll a dice; on a 1 the Runelord has failed and nothing happens. On a roll of 2 or more the runes hammered into his allies’ wargear glow white-hot with rune magic and the power takes effect. Ancestral Shield: Until your next hero phase, you can roll a dice whenever a model in this unit suffers a wound or a mortal wound. On a 6, that wound or mortal wound is ignored. Forgefire: Until your next hero phase, increase the Rend characteristics of the unit’s weapons by 1 (i.e. ‘-’ becomes -1, -1 becomes -2 and so on).

rules.name: Runic Axes
rules.text: The Unforged launches a deadly flurry of blows. You can re-roll all hit rolls of 1 for an Unforged.

rules.name: Epic Deathblow
rules.text: If an Unforged is slain in the combat phase, roll a dice before it is removed. On a roll of 4 or more, you can inflict D3 mortal wounds on the enemy unit that struck the fatal blow (inflict D6 mortal wounds instead if a Chaos model struck the final blow).

rules.name: Nemesis
rules.text: Attacks made by an Unforged inflict double Damage against Chaos units.

rules.name: The Bigger They are...
rules.text: You can add 1 to any wound rolls for an Unforged if the target of the attack has a Wounds characteristic of more than 1.

rules.name: Ancestor Shield
rules.text: You can re-roll all failed saves for a Warden King.

rules.name: Oath Stone
rules.text: In the hero phase, a Warden King can stand atop his oath stone to increase the resolve of his followers. If he does so, he cannot move until his next hero phase, but all Dispossessed units from your army within 18" in the battleshock phase may use the Warden King’s Bravery instead of their own.

rules.name: Ancestral Grudge
rules.text: If a Warden King uses this ability, pick one enemy unit within 16". Until your next hero phase, you can add 1 to wound rolls for all attacks made by Dispossessed models that target that unit.

rules.name: Guild Bombs
rules.text: Once per battle, a unit of Gyrocopters can drop their Guild Bombs. To do so, pick one enemy unit that the Gyrocopters flew over in the movement phase. Then, roll two dice for each Gyrocopter in the unit; each time you roll a 4 or more, the unit being bombed suffers a mortal wound.

rules.name: Engineer
rules.text: In your hero phase, a Dwarf Engineer can repair a single War Machine within 4". That model repairs 1 wound.

rules.name: Ancient Grudges
rules.text: Reroll all hit rolls of 1

rules.name: Stubborn to the End
rules.text: If you roll a 1, 2 or 3 for a battleshock test, the unit passes.

rules.text: Reroll all hit rolls of 1

rules.name: Stubborn to the End
rules.text: If you roll a 1, 2 or 3 for a battleshock test, the unit passes.
